dadi aandolanayata thudu di athi landanaye shri lanka thanapathi karyalaya asala wu siduwima deshapalana wasi sandaha yoda noganna lesatath, aanduwa ema gataluwa wisanda adala niladhariwaraya beraganna bawatath widuli sandesha ha dijital yatithala pahasukam amathi harin pranandu ada pawathi madhya hamuwakadi prakasha kaleya.
eheth mehidi mathu wana gataluwa wanne ee yudamaya kriyamarga api ketharam durata pili gannawa da yannayi.
